title: Band of Robbers. Official Movie Trailer #1 [HD] (2016)
description:
In theaters: January 15th, 2015

Description:

A modern-day retelling of Mark Twainâ€™s iconic books, Band of Robbers is a comedic adventure that reimagines the characters as grown men, and small-time crooks. When Huck Finn is released from prison, he hopes to leave his criminal life behind, but his lifelong friend, and corrupt cop, Tom Sawyer, has other plans. Not ready to give up on his childhood fantasies, Tom forms the Band of Robbers, recruiting their misfit friends Joe Harper and Ben Rogers to join them for an elaborate plan to find a fabled treasure. But the plan soon unravels, thrusting the guys on a wild journey with dangerous consequences.

Director: Aaron Nee, Adam Nee

Writers: Aaron Nee, Adam Nee

Actors: Kyle Gallner, Adam Nee, Matthew Gray Gubler, Melissa Benoist, Hannibal Buress, Eric Christian Olsen, Stephen Lang, Daniel Mora

Genre: Comedy, Drama

Run Time: 1 hour 35 minutes
